page.title: 12CHILDWALL - TRANSPORT
page.content: The area lies just to the south of the{M.62. MOTORWAY,}which terminates in a junction with the{A5058, {LIVERPOOL RING ROAD,}known as{QUEEN'S {DRIVE.}QUEEN'S DRIVE passes through the western end of the area joining with the{A562, MENLOVE AVENUE,}which leads down to {SPEKE AIRPORT}and the {GARSTON CONTAINER TERMINAL. Consequently a fair amount of heavygoods traffic is seen in this part. Additionally, as this area is mainly residential, peak hour commuter traffic is quite heavy on these roads and also on the {B5178, CHILDWALL {VALLEY ROAD,}which serves the large residential estates of{NETHERLEY} and {BELLE VALE. } Twelve public transport{BUS ROUTES enter the area at various points.
